videos.description: Jermaine Samuels gets the hoop and the harm just before halftime to send Villanova into the break with a lead.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Villanova's Jermaine Samuels banks in tough and-1 bucket) 2022/3/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Villanova's Jermaine Samuels banks in tough and-1 bucket

videos.description: Collin Gillespie sends a sweet pass to Eric Dixon for a Villanova basket just in the nick of time.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Collin Gillespie's dime helps Villanova beat the shot clock) 2022/3/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Collin Gillespie's dime helps Villanova beat the shot clock

videos.description: Brandon Slater denies Tyrese Martin with a big-time block for Villanova.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Villanova's Brandon Slater absolutely erases shot at the rim) 2022/3/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Villanova's Brandon Slater absolutely erases shot at the rim

videos.description: Villanova hangs on in the final seconds to beat UConn in dramatic fashion.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Nova survives at the buzzer vs. UConn to advance to Big East final) 2022/3/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nova survives at the buzzer vs. UConn to advance to Big East final
